Installation
```
# MacOS
brew install emacs --with-cocoa
brew install brewsci/science/ess
```

Configuration
```
## ~/.emacs
;; Loading ESS
(require 'ess-site)

```

Basic commands. Syntax: `~ab~` means `C-a C-b`
```
~xf~    Open file
~x~o    Switch to other window
~x~0    Close current window

~cn~    Evaluate line
~cp~    Evaluate paragraph
```
